Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>Hold it right there! <sp:5:0:0>You can't cut
in line. We were here first!
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><sp:0:2:2:5000>How long is her big exhibition going to last?<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>We had to make space to exhibit my
sister's new piece, so all of our other
wares got shelved.<sp:0:4:0>This is no way to do business...
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You were helping Clavia on the side too,
weren't you?<sp:0:4:0>No, no, that's a good thing. It's because
of your work that our mayoral election
ended on a high note.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff> has been wanting to talk to you,
so don't leave without saying hello.<sp:0:4:0>I think she has <clr:0000>something very special<clr:ffff>
for you!
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Having a good night? Fashion never
sleeps, and here at <clr:0000>Ventest Clothing<clr:ffff>,
neither do we!
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>Oh, I know no one likes to hear this,
but I can't buy that from you.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>You want to sell me...the clothes you're
wearing? <sp:5:0:0>Have you considered taking
them off first? Please consider that.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh my! I'm sorry to keep you waiting.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Are you also a tourist who's come to see
my sister's...<sp:5:0:0>I mean, the new line of
Cece products?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>As long as it's just you, you're free to go
into the shop! <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff> herself is in there
right now, in fact.<sp:0:4:0>Nothing you'll see is for sale. It's only an
exhibition right now. Sorry to disappoint!
Talk_11: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>Sure, I know that. <sp:5:0:0>It was...<sp:5:0:0>just a joke?
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>We're a <clr:0000>clothing shop<clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0> with lots of apparel
to choose from!<sp:0:4:0>Normal wear to adventure wear, you'll
find it where? Right here!
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yeah. It's not like this is the only clothing
place in the village. What do you say we
kill some time at the <clr:0000>dye shop<clr:ffff>?
Talk_0006: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Sure, I'll buy! <sp:5:0:0>What would you like to sell?
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Yeah. Everything I heard said this was
some of Cece's <clr:0000>best work<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>Oh...we appear to be sold out. So sorry!
Look forward to our next restock!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>By all means, head on in before somebody
else shows up!<sp:0:4:0>Between you and me, <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff> herself is here
right now!<sp:0:4:0>That said, we're only displaying the new
Cece line right now, not selling it. Sorry
to disappoint!
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I can finally do business again! Ventest
Clothing is back!<sp:0:4:0>Feel free to browse. We appreciate all
your support!
Talk_16: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Ooh! Or we could check out the <clr:0000>pasture<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff> has been waiting for you!<sp:0:4:0>I think she wants to give you <clr:0000>something
really good<clr:ffff>. Lucky you!
Com_Talk_05b: <sp:3:0:2:0000>Take your time. We're in no hurry.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Speaking of which, I've heard that a little
ways up the road from the pasture is a
<clr:0000>laboratory <clr:ffff>specializing in ancient stuff.
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Just like I pictured! The difference is
night and day, isn't it?<sp:0:4:0>Not many people could pull off that hat
with such verve.
Com_Talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>What would you like to sell me?
Com_Talk_05c: <sp:3:0:2:0000>Do you have any goods you don't need?
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Since we got all dolled up, we may as well
hit the town and see it all!
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I see you've taken a liking to the hat!<sp:0:4:0>It's a custom articleâ€”the only one of its
kind. I've no doubt that it's turning heads
among the stylish set all over Hyrule!
Com_Talk_05d:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'd hate to buy something off you if you
still have a use for it!
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I'm relieved to hear that my sister isn't
up to anything sinister.<sp:0:4:0>Thanks very much for looking into it!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's too bad Reede and my sister refuse
to be honest with each other.<sp:0:4:0>If they just talked it out, I think they'd
see how much they have in common.
Com_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Thank you! Is there anything else you'd
like to sell?
Com_Talk_02b:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>We appreciate your business! What else
can we do for you today?
Com_Talk_02c: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Thank you very much! Please come again!
Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Understood! Would you like to sell
anything else?
Com_Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Understood! Don't forget to take a look
at the rest of our line!
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Sir, you don't have quite enough for
this purchase.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>Sir, your bag is full. Let's table this
transaction until you've reorganized
your things!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What do you mean? <sp:5:0:0>We took the trouble
to come here, and now you're saying we
can't get in?!<sp:0:4:0>But I wanted to see <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>'s new stuff!
It's not every day a mega-famous fashion
designer debuts new material.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm so, so sorry, <sp:5:0:0>but we only have one
entry ticket remaining.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>One ticket? <sp:5:0:0>So you're saying...ONE
person could go in.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:QuestionNormal>Hey, come on now. <sp:5:1:0>We can't let just one
of us get a head start!
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>People who lack clothes just love it here
at <clr:0000>Ventest Clothing<clr:ffff>!
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>As I've said multiple times now, <sp:5:0:0>I can't
admit three customers at present.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh well. Maybe if we come back later,
they'll have room for all of us.
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, you solved the mystery of what my
sister has been doing in secret.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>But while she's been busy with that,
our shop is deep in the red.
